skill_constraints: DevOps bottleneck in Sprint 1. Key person dependencies for DevOps and Backend Security.
mitigation_strategies: Frontend team to work against mocked APIs. DevOps to document all IaC for knowledge sharing.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and coordination overhead for the contractor.
resource_bottlenecks: QA E2E test development might become the new bottleneck.
mitigation_strategies: Assign a dedicated point of contact for the contractor. Have clear onboarding documentation ready.
